points.title: Welcome to Margadeshaka
points.description:
Margadeshaka builds AI products that guide your journey and accelerate your learning.

We combine ancient wisdom with modern technology to create tools that truly understand and support you.

points.title: Our Mission
points.description:
To create AI that guides and educates.

Not transactional bots, but thoughtful companions that help you navigate life's decisions and master new skills.

We believe AI should empower human potential, not replace human connection.

points.title: Sakha - Your AI Friend
points.description:
Sakha combines ancient Vedic wisdom with modern AI.

Your AI companion for life's journey - providing personalized guidance through birth chart analysis, relationship compatibility, auspicious timing, and emotional support.

Powered by GPT-4 and authentic astronomical calculations.

points.title: Sakha Features
points.description:
• AI emotional coaching with CBT exercises
• Vedic birth chart & Dasha predictions
• Relationship compatibility (Ashtakoot Guna)
• Muhurta - find auspicious timing
• Available on Web, iOS, Android

Tech: React Native, Azure OpenAI, Swiss Ephemeris

points.title: Dronacharya - Learn by Thinking
points.description:
Dronacharya (LearnFlow AI) replaces passive video learning with active AI tutoring.

Six specialized AI agents guide you through interactive lessons, adapt to your understanding, and help you build real projects for your portfolio.

Learn by thinking, not watching.

points.title: Dronacharya Features
points.description:
• Multi-agent AI tutoring (no videos)
• Adaptive difficulty & teaching style
• Bronze/Silver/Gold certifications
• Gamification with XP & achievements
• Enterprise team management

Tech: Next.js, LangGraph, Multi-Agent AI

points.title: Our Approach
points.description:
We build with intention:

• Deep understanding over shallow responses
• Ancient wisdom meets modern AI
• Privacy-first design
• Thoughtful, human-centered experiences

Every feature exists to genuinely help, not to extract.

points.title: Join the Journey
points.description:
We're building the future of AI-powered guidance and learning.

Whether you're seeking clarity in life decisions or mastering new skills, Margadeshaka is here to walk with you.

Explore Sakha at sakha.app
Coming soon: Dronacharya at learnflow.ai
